Hi,

I am still a newbie in the domain of web archiving and one thing that
surprises me with WARC files is that it's quite common to include DNS
records but I have never seen anything about including whois records (I
may have missed something since Google searches for "whois" are polluted
by whois gateways...).

Whois includes sensitive information about the domain owner and I would
have thought that it's something worth archiving.

Isn't it the case?

Thanks,

Eric

-- 
Eric van der Vlist <vdv@...>
Owark (http://owark.org/)
